verses.text: \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Osee \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beeri|strong="H0882"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ozias, Joathan, Achaz, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ezechias \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Joas \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lordâ€™s|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* Osse: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Osee: Go, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* fornications, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* fornications: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fornication \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* depart \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* went, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Debelaim: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* Jezrahel: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w while|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Jezrahel \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Jezrahel.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*: \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w Without|strong="H3808"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* utterly \w forget|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* she \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* called Without mercy. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w yours|strong="H0859"\w*.

And the number of the children of Israel shall be as the sand of the sea, that is without measure, and shall not be numbered. And it shall be in the place where it shall be said to them: You are not my people: it shall be said to them: Ye are the sons of the living God.
And the children of Juda, and the children of Israel shall be gathered together: and they shall appoint themselves one head, and shall come up out of the land: for great is the day of Jezrahel.
